response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its true worth to be $15,000. However, considering our current market position and strategic goals, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $12,000. This represents a substantial saving of $3,000 compared to its perceived value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I am confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways, aligning with your long-term objectives. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product features and benefits. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
